data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Throw-in high up the field for Fortaleza in Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in the half of Recife PE.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 4, Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Recife PE.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 5, In Fortaleza Fortaleza attack through Wellington Paulista. The finish is off target, however.
Recife PE have a goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 9, Fortaleza are pushing forward but Juninho's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Estadio Castelao.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Fortaleza close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Recife PE at Estadio Castelao.
Ball goes out of play for a Fortaleza goal kick.
In the minute 15, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza drive into the zone and Tinga is presented with a brilliant opportunity. But his strike hits the upright!
In the minute 20, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Romarinho of Fortaleza gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 21, Recife PE have a goal kick.
Free kick Fortaleza.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In the minute 25, Fortaleza to take a throw-in in Recife PE territory.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Can Fortaleza capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Recife PE's half?
In the minute 26, Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Fortaleza push upfield and Wellington Paulista gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Recife PE defence.
Recife PE's Ricardinho has run offside.
In the minute 33, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Luan Polli for Recife PE who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
In the minute 36, Fortaleza surge into the attack at Estadio Castelao but Davidâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Recife PE at Estadio Castelao.
Luan Polli is back on the pitch.
In the minute 36, Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
Recife PE's Ricardinho goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 39, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Fortaleza have been awarded a corner by Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
In the minute 41, Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fortaleza awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Fortaleza a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Fortaleza.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Recife PE's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Fortaleza.
In the minute 45, The 1st half is prolonged by 2 minutes of added time.
Recife PE to take a throw-in in Fortaleza territory.
Throw-in for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 45, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards Recife PE a goal kick.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Fortaleza to check on Romarinho, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 49, Romarinho has recovered and rejoins the match in Fortaleza.
Ball goes out of play for a Recife PE goal kick.
Free kick Recife PE.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Fortaleza in the half of Recife PE.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal! The home team take a 1-0 lead thanks to a penalty from Wellington Paulista.
In the minute 56, At Estadio Castelao, Romarinho has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Betinho (Recife PE) gets a yellow card. He will be suspended from the next match!
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 59, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
Free kick for Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 61, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE.
Felipe is booked for the home team and will be suspended from the next match.
Daniel Paulista (Recife PE) is making a first substitution, with Rogerio replacing Betinho.
Ball safe as Recife PE is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Recife PE in the half of Fortaleza.
Juan Quintero (Fortaleza) has received a first yellow card.
Goal kick for Fortaleza at Estadio Castelao.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE.
In the minute 68, David (Fortaleza) has received a yellow card from Felipe Fernandes de Lima.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 71, Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a Fortaleza throw-in in Recife PE's half.
The home team have replaced Tinga with Gabriel Dias. This is the first substitution made today by Rogerio Ceni.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Recife PE in their own half.
In the minute 76, Throw-in Fortaleza.
Free kick for Fortaleza in their own half.
Recife PE awarded a free kick in their own half.
Felipe Fernandes de Lima signals a free kick to Fortaleza in their own half.
In the minute 81, Tiago Orobo is on a sub for Paulao for Fortaleza.
Ronald is booked for the home team.
In the minute 86, Daniel Paulista is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Castelao with Lucas Venuto replacing Marquinhos.
Can Recife PE get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Fortaleza's half?
Can Recife PE capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 89, Hernane Brocador (Recife PE) shoots â€“ and rattles the crossbar!
Felipe Fernandes de Lima awards the away team a throw-in.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-0.
